Plintissa and Artist walk on through the field and come to a forest. Artist=
 trips stupidly over an object, uncovering it. Plintissa picks it up. She g=
asped. It was Dracona's. Plintissa suddenly worried for her friend.

"Artis=
t, let's go back to the People's Base." Plintissa said.

"Right." Artist re=
plied, he smiled and hit himself in the head before following Plintissa to =
the People's Base.

Demos and Inzola step outside of the Maximal base.

Sin=
esis, Sinister, and Dracona keep running and clear the autoguns firing rang=
e of the Predacon base.

Gangon's spark is still with BrightBlade. It glowe=
d omniously and lit up the container it was in.

The Radicons walked toward=
s the Predacon base and seen Sinesis and Sinister running with Dracona. Air=
bomber looked back to see if Infectra was still following. If she was then =
he smiles, if she wasn't he frowns.

"Where are you heading?" Stranato call=
ed. Dracona got an idea, maybe they were willing to work for her.

"Follow =
me to the People's Base!" Dracona called.

"We have nothing better to do, l=
et's move, team!" Stranato said. The Radicons ran after Dracona, Sinister, =
and Sinesis...
